name: Darken VR
description:
Set in the world of the horror/science fiction film DARKEN, DARKEN in VR lets you experience the labyrinth rooms of DARKEN - rooms that belong to the lost souls who have been sent to this strange world to be cared for by their altruistic overseer Mother Darken. But who will help them now that Mother Darken has gone missing? With accompanying voice-over narration from the film's cast, learn more about DARKEN'S history and why it's falling apart.

In this on-rails guided experiential ride through the world of DARKEN VR, experience a premium cinematic virtual reality experience with lush and decadent environments, then be plunged into the squalor of rooms ravished by war and famine. Guided through each unique ambient scene, slowly unravel the mystery of DARKEN VR.

This virtual reality experience contains seven (7) scenes and is supported for HTC Vive and Oculus Rift.
